result.content:
<test page>

br.ufsc.fit.fixtures.WithDrawnSetUpFixtureTest
id user account balance card number pin Number of bills of 5, 10, 20, 50 and 100, respectively
1 J.F. Piper 125654-08 90.00 99998888777766665555 123456 0,200,0,150,100

ActionFixture
start br.ufsc.fit.fixtures.WithDrawActionFixtureTest
enter card 99998888777766665555
check getCard J.F. Piper
enter amount 30.00
press OK
check isValidAmount true
enter PIN 123456
press Confirm
check isValidPIN error
check balance 60.00
